attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we live in a mobile home in corsham wilts, both my husband and i are registered disabled.today i have spoken to north wilts district council ref free help for loft and wall insulation.i was told no, because we live in a mobile home, that cannot be moved, it is a home regardless, this is a discrimination to people who are not only disabled but live in a mobile home,i hope he goernment can help, many homes today are built of wood anyway. thankyou

rejection.details: This is appears to be a matter for your local council.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
